text:
M.AZARUDEEN (Civil Engineer)
E-mail ID:  mazarcivil@gmail.com  
Mobile No: +91 7200378717              CURRICULUM VITAE
      
                                                                                                    
Job Objective
To be adaptable in the working environment and to contribute with my knowledge and hard 
work towards the growth of the organization and myself.
 Area of Interest
Project Engineer
QA/QC Engineer
Educational Qualification
B.E. (Civil Eng. 2010-2013) from MAM college of Engineering, Tirchy.                                 
Anna University - 65% 
Diploma (Civil Eng. 2005-2008) from St. Xavier’s Polytechnic College, Tutricorin – 60%
Computer Skills
Windows 7, MS-Office 2010, AutoCAD 
Work Experience
1.“United Welfare organization”
Position: Senior Site Engineer  (Dec 2015 – Mar 2017)
Project Details:
      Name of the Project:  United welfare Project
                  Type: Residential
Role of Work:
Executed different types of footings, columns, beams, slab,  retaining wall and other interiors work 
including finishing of the structures.
Comprehensive knowledge of the structural and architectural layout of various construction works.
Weekly Labor Bill Checking, taking Quantities for the Issued Drawings and indented the material 
required for the Project.
Planning the construction sequence and work methodologies.
2. “MAM COLLEGE”, Tirchy.   
 Position: Site Engineer (April 2013 – Dec 2015)CURRICULUM VITAE
Project Details:
Name of the Project: Sky line project
Type: Multi Projects (Bridges, Residential etc.)
Role of Work:
Project Plan Preparation, Estimation and Execution of the work.
Preparing of construction schedules, fixing of milestones for the project as per the 
contract period.
Supervised and organized the survey team.
Preparation of Weekly Progress Report and Daily Progress Report.
Prepared programs of work (cost estimate) for Pre-engineering activities including survey
report for new projects, permanent structures and other transport roads.
Executed comprehensive survey in diverse areas: Topographic Survey, Profile and Cross 
Section, Land Subdivision and Relocation - using Total Station and Auto level 
instruments.
Prepared weekly and monthly accomplishment reports.
3. “AL FALAH Construction Limited ”, Chennai.  
       (Architects/Interiors/Turnkey Projects)  
      Position: Senior Site Engineer  (April 2008 – Apr 2010)        
Project Details:
      Name of the Project:  SRM Merritt Project
                  Type: Residential and Commercial 
Role of Work:
The Project consists of hotel (Three Basements+G.F+10 Floors), Two Swimming Pools and 
Residential Apartments (Two Basements+ G.F+12 Floors)   
Executed different types of footings, columns, beams, slab,  retaining wall and other interiors 
work including finishing of the structures.
Comprehensive knowledge of  the structural and architectural layout of various construction 
works.
Weekly Labor Bill Checking, taking Quantities for the Issued Drawings and indented the 
material required for the Project.
Planning the construction sequence and work methodologies.
Executing the project with a goal of zero accident with 100% safety measures.
Monitoring construction activities to ensure the completion of project within the time frame 
set, good quality, cost parameters and hand over.CURRICULUM VITAE
